p: The three replicates from S. oryzae adult samples (2–7 days) (without treatment as control and other treated with three selected EOs) after 1 and 2 h exposure time of treatment were used for total RNA extraction using about 0.1 g from each replicate through using Tripure total RNA extraction reagent, according to the manufacturer’s instructions. RNA concentration and purity were recorded by using NanoDrop™ 2000 (A260/A280).
